pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 GTX or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060 GTX or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Try out the demo for the upcoming King of Retail 2, and get a glimpse of what the game will be about. Try and design your own display, look around in the city, and most importantly see if you have what it takes to survive the first few days of running a brand new new store.
